definition: to fire after the horse has bolted (idiom); to act too late to be effective
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating

sentences.english: Safety more timely rain, less education an afterthought.
sentences.chinese: 安全多下及時雨，教育少放馬後炮。
